directions: In a punch bowl, combine strawberries, orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, water and tea. Stir in sugar and rum. Add Ice, and pour in lemon soda.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen sliced strawberries in syrup
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate
2 (2 liter) bottles lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, chilled
title: Party Punch II
